params.adapter: Address of the adapter implementing the method.
params.selector: Bytes4 hex of the method selector.

params.adapter: Address of the adapter implementing the method.
params.selector: Bytes4 hex of the method selector.

devdoc.title: Authority - Allows to set up the base rules of the protocol.

NewOwner(address,address).notice: Emitted when new owner is set.

PermissionAdded(address,address,uint8).notice: Adds a permission for a role.

PermissionRemoved(address,address,uint8).notice: Removes a permission for a role.

addMethod(bytes4,address).notice: Allows a whitelister to whitelist a method.We do not save list of approved as better queried by events.

getApplicationAdapter(bytes4).notice: Returns the address of the adapter associated to the signature.

isWhitelistedFactory(address).notice: Provides whether a factory is whitelisted.

isWhitelister(address).notice: Provides whether an address is whitelister.

owner().notice: Returns the address of the owner.

removeMethod(bytes4,address).notice: Allows a whitelister to remove a method.

setAdapter(address,bool).notice: Allows owner to set extension adapter address.

setFactory(address,bool).notice: Allows an admin to set factory permission.

setOwner(address).notice: Allows current owner to set a new owner address.

setWhitelister(address,bool).notice: Allows the owner to set whitelister permission.Whitelister permission is required to approve methods in extensions adapter.
